value:
As stated on our homepage, you can reach out to us via our GitHub repository. However, if you prefer not to use GitHub, which is primarily a platform for development, you have alternative means to contact us:

  • Emails: contact@historytracers.org and historytracers@gmail.com
  • Social Media Channels: X (antigo Twitter), Facebook, Instagram, Threads, and Bluesky.

History Tracers does not use cookies on any page except this one, as required by Google Forms. If you prefer not to accept Google Forms cookies, you can contact us via email or through our social media channels.
